kick.title: Tiyisisa xirho xa ku raha .
kick.content: Xana u tiyisile leswaku u lava ku hlongola xirho ekamareni?

ban.title: Tiyisisa xirho lexi yirisiweke .
ban.content: Xana u tiyisile leswaku u lava ku yirisa xirho lexi? Xirho a xi nge swi koti ku tlhela xi joyina kamara endzhaku ka ku yirisiwa.

toast.loadError: Ku tsandzeka ku layicha nxaxamelo wa swirho .

invite.title: Rhamba swirho ku joyina kamara .
invite.inputLabel: Hi kombela u nghenisa ID ya mutirhisi wa Matrix (ku fana na @user:matrix.org) .
invite.error: Xirhambo xi tsandzekile, hi kombela u kambela ID ya mutirhisi kumbe mpfumelelo .

MemberManagementContent.empty: Ku hava xirho xa le henhla xa .
